717671f-a.title: Manhattan: Broadway - 78th Street (West)
717671f-a.text:
Broadway, north from West 78th Street, and showing the First
Baptist Church at the N.W. corner of West 79th Street. This organization
in 1890 sold its property at Park Ave. and 39th Street,preparatory to the
wrection of the edifice shown; services being held meanwhile in a orick
chapel in West 81st Street. This is the fifth home occupied by this
religious group since its organization in 1762; a rigging-loft being
utilized as a place of worsnip prior to that. The ten story structure at
the right is the Hadrian Building. No. 224046 Broadway, at the N.E.
corner of West 80th Street.
January 1906.
George L. Balgue.
CREDIT LINE IMPERATIVE ON ALL REPRODUCTIONS.
N. ~2IG0
